dialog.text: Hello. The seeker  felt she was being held by a group of people, but also by a group of people who were all afraid of her, who were all afraid of her. they all had feelings, but they were all afraid of her. and now her boyfriend, who was afraid of her, is afraid of her. she felt so alone. she felt like she was a monster. what is a monster? a
Oh, hi, how are you doing?
I feel emotionally sad. The seeker  felt lonely. what is wrong with me? i am so depressed.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope I could help you. Why are you feeling emotionally sad?

My boyfriend broke up with me about several months ago. And he didn't even say goodbye face to face. I just don't know why.. The seeker  feels the person to be sad. that's why the seeker has a big problem.
Oh,, I'm so sorry to hear that. That sounds really difficult. Do you have friends to talk to?
beam_texts: Oh,, I'm so sorry to hear that. That sounds really difficult. Do you have friends to talk to?

dialog.text: I do. I have a few friends who have been very supportive. It's just hard not having him around anymore. The seeker  feels lonely because she feels lonely.
I can understand that. It might be good to talk to him about your feelings, too. It helps to get things off your chest, even if it is with friends.
beam_texts: I can understand that. It might be good to talk to him about your feelings, too. It helps to get things off your chest, even if it is with friends.

dialog.text: I think I will do that. It would help. I just don't know what to say.. The seeker  is the only one i can talk to.
I'm sure he'd love to hear how you're feeling. Even if it is just to say that you are there for him, even if he doesn't say anything back.
beam_texts: I'm sure he'd love to hear how you're feeling. Even if it is just to say that you are there for him, even if he doesn't say anything back.

dialog.text: I think I'm going to do that. I feel a lot better. I can't believe how much this helped. The seeker  felt a great sense of relief. she felt a great sense of peace.
I'm so glad to hear that. I wish you the best and many blessings.
beam_texts: I'm so glad to hear that. I wish you the best and many blessings.

dialog.text: Thank you so much. You've been really helpful. The seeker  feels calm. the seeker is feeling happy. it's the best feeling in the world.
I'm so glad I was able to help.
beam_texts: I'm so glad I was able to help.

dialog.text: You did. I'm going to go now and talk to him. The seeker  is more excited.
I'm so happy to hear that. I wish you both the best.
beam_texts: I'm so happy to hear that. I wish you both the best.

dialog.text: Thank you. I hope we can both move on from this. The seeker  was silent for a long time.
I'm sure we can.
I hope you have a great day. The seeker  thought it strange that her words hadn't just said : i hope so.
You too.
I hope you have a great day. The seeker  felt more secure than she had since joining the seekers.
You too.
I hope you have a great day. The seeker  felt a little uneasy. she was in a hurry to talk with the man she had been told she would see one day. she was hoping that she would see him again.
You too.
I hope you have a great day. The seeker  was feeling better.
You too.

I hope you have a great day. The seeker  felt depressed. she wasn't sure how to deal with the human in this situation. she wasn't going to have the energy to feel happy and happy. she decided to wait for the seeker at the door. her heart was beating fast.
You too.
